DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : A breast cancer rehabilitation program exercise therapy may help improve quality life breast cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study breast cancer rehabilitation program improving quality life breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Breast Cancer Rehabilitation Program Improving Quality Life Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To estimate accrual , retention , adherence , participation breast cancer survivor breast cancer rehabilitation program . II . To estimate variability weight , six-minute walk , quality life psychosocial physical measure woman participate BCRP . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess change anthropometric , psychosocial , physical outcome six-month period BCRP . II . To document type rate adverse event associate BCRP . OUTLINE : Patients attend exercise therapy session 1 hour 3 time week 6 month . Exercise therapy session comprise 10 minute warm-up light stretch aerobic type exercise ( walking , cycle ) , 30 minute endurance type exercise ( cycle , walk ) , 20 minute resistance training exercise .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion First occurrence breast cancer BMI > = 25 Recently complete treatment ( chemotherapy/radiation ) breast cancer ( = < 8 week ) , receive adjuvant hormonal therapy Willing comply study visit , outline protocol Lives within 30 mile study site , willing travel study site outside 30mile radius Ability participate moderate exercise program , freedom orthopedic abnormality would prevent participation Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document Exclusion Unstable angina Cardiac conduction disturbance Plans move study area Dementia medically document suspected Advanced arterial disease cause ischemia limb Physical immobility Homebound medical reason Dependent wheelchair mobility Chronic disease significantly reduce 4year survival Recurrent breast cancer
